Description: Fragment of oval handle at neck join of a Rhodian pottery transport amphora. Clay fine beige-brown; cream slip. Circular stamp with rose symbol.
Production date: 172 BC (see N. Badoud, Le temps de Rhodes, 2015, 142.)
Curator's comments: Ink '1170,4' (an IG XIII 1 number erroneously allocated). Name Nikasagoras. From same die as Delos TD2858.
Bibliographic references: Stoddart 1847 / Memoir on the inscribed pottery of Rhodes, Cnidus and other Greek Cities (197)
